svg.text: If theme is available for free, change theme and return
If theme available online then take payment, download theme from this website
Reflect the change in the game
Computer is assigned as the second player
Game starts with pong ball moving in a random direction
move the pong ball in the decided direction and with decided speed
collision with upper or lower wall
updates the direction and velocity for the movement of pong ball
move the pong ball in the decided direction and with decided speed
collision with the paddle of players
updates the direction and velocity for the movement of pong ball
move the pong ball in the decided direction and with decided speed
the score of winning player is increased by one
either player A or player B reaches 10 points first
ask for replay or quitting the game
